full_threads.body:
Great, thank you. Will do!

Have a wonderful week!

Christine

Hi Christine,

Yes, that’s exactly what we addressed. I’ve double-checked everything to ensure it's set up correctly and working as expected moving forward.

Let me know if you run into any issues!

Thanks Rica,

It's when they go to the main page and click on Vivante - then the error message comes up. It seems to be working again now. Can we please make sure the link works moving forward when it's accessed this way too - this is the main way they access this page.

Thanks,

Christine

Hi Christine,

Apologies for the mix-up. It looks like the old link was inadvertently restored. I've now updated the link and set up a redirect, so anyone visiting the old URL (/moxi-v/) will automatically be directed to the new one.

Let me know if you need anything else!

Hi Rica,

Following up on the below please?

Thanks,

Christine

Hi Rica,

This is happening again? Why is this the case please? How can it be prevented?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia marked as Closed

full_threads.body:
Thank you, it's working again.

Happy Friday!

Hi Christine,

Sorry about that. I have updated the Vivante link in the Marketing Catalogue now.

Here's the link:
https://unitronmarketing.com.au/marketing-catalogue/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi Rica,

The Vivante page is coming up as cannot be found - please look into this asap.

Thanks,

Christine
